Name: Edge Of The End
About the game: Edge Of The End is a survival single player game, a post apocalyptic survival game with lots of actions and graphics, and horror moments, the story is begins when Adam Wright(The Main Character) Daughter Lost In a Zombies Crowd and Helicopter Blast, His Son Andrew Wright, Got Lost Since She was a Kid, Christina Wright(Adam's Daughter) Tries To Find Him Alot, But Didn't Found Him But Then She Found Her Father(Adam) and they both have to survive from the town named Blackpool, and fight all the army of the blackpool state, and fight Blackpool Raiders, And Zombies, The Journey Of Adam and Chrissy Is Very Interesting, You Would Love To Play This Game, And The Emotional Story. KEY FEATURES Upto 10 Different Maps Explore The State Of Blackpool Search For Weapons Hard Survival INCLUDES Additional Soundtrack New Updates Of Multiplayer and Additional Stuff
